text: I am planning to build a RIA about a year from now (when my current contract ends).
What technology would you recommend investing time in?
I will need good cross browser/platform support for video, music, and canvas.
And ideally I would like to leverage my Python skills.
Silverlight looks interesting because I could use Python through .NET.
But I'm on Linux so I'd always be a 2nd class citizen.
And it has a low install base.
Flash on the other hand has a large install base.
And I'm not sure about JavaFX because of the Oracle deal.
Or should I hold my hopes out for HTML 5?
